subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A vertical mirror must be provided at the washbasin, with a reflective surface that—

ol.li: is not less than 600 mm wide; and
has its bottom edge not more than 900 mm above finished floor level; and
has its top edge not less than 1850 mm above finished floor level.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: If a second vertical mirror is provided in the facility, it must have a reflective surface that—

ol.li: is not less than 600 mm wide; and
has its bottom edge not less than 600 mm above finished floor level; and
has its top edge not less than 1850 mm above finished floor level.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Towel dispensers, hand dryers, soap dispensers and the like must be operable using one hand, and must be installed with their output or operative components—

ol.li: between 900 mm and 1100 mm above finished floor level; and
not less than 500 mm from any internal corner.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A soap dispenser must be installed above the integrated shelf required by S27C5(4).

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A clothing hook must be installed so that it is located—

ol.li: at a height of between 1200 mm and 1350 mm above finished floor level; and
not less than 500 mm from any internal corner.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A sling hook with a minimum projection of 50 mm from the wall must be installed beside the change table at a height of 1500 mm above finished floor level.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Disposal bins must be provided as follows:

ol.li: A sanitary disposal bin in the corner adjacent to the toilet pan.
An incontinence pad disposal bin in the corner adjacent to the change table.

callout.p: The purpose of the sling hook is to store the sling when it is not in use.
